parameters: \lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]...and sing the song of creation, they did~ ♫

\|
Struck the forge and breathed life anew~ ♫

\|
Herald the Parade of Praan and rejoice... ♫
\lsoffAt \N[10]'s workbench, you can spend gold to buy advanced Puppet equipment, including Frames, which change puppets' appearances, and Cores, which grant them significant stat changes and skills.
\lsoffIf you equip a puppet with the Crafter's Scroll attachment, they may take on special appearances with the right combination of Frames and Cores.
\lsoffFor example, combining the Giannan Frame with the Magus or Warrior Cores will result in some familiar faces...
\lsoffMore Frames and Cores will become available over time as you defeat bosses and use \N[10]'s JP to learn certain skills.
\lsoff\N[10] must be a Puppetmaster to use her workbench.
\lsoff...Without \N[10], this just looks like a bunch of insane scrawls and puppet blueprints...
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]The sculpture password is meant to grant those who know it audience with the Maharani...

\!
You are in the presence of Great Maharani Samona Shah, the Puppetmaster of Gianna!

\!
What you call a monster is in fact the very precipice of mortal perfection!!

\!
You are but another antagonist in my legend...
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]Then I shall grant you three questions.

\!
You may ask anything you like about me...
What do you know about the Orbs?

\!
You've come all this way and you don't even know...?
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]...Well, I am Puppetmaster Samona Shah, immortal puppeteer and physical goddess.
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]Anyone who has ever wielded a puppet with magic in Gianna owes their techniques to me.
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]I... am a sentient puppet, the height of physical perfection in this world!
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]I do not age. \!I do not need food or water.

\!
I do not need sleep. \!I can modify myself as I wish.
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]To that end, I guide my disciples' studies in exchange for their total devotion to me.

\!
It's a fair exchange, don't you think?
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]This is my school, my temple, my home...
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]The materials I have here and the magics I have weaved over the decades cannot be found anywhere else - it is a puppetcrafter's dream.
What do you know about the Orbs?

\!
I must admit, their sheer power does intrigue me...
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]After I attain complete physical perfection, I shall seek them out and take them for my own.
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]Perhaps then I could speak with the Goddess herself...
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]Now take care, you only have one question left...
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]Ah, *now* you have only one question left...
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]Now, let me tell you what that question will be.

\!
You will ask, \|"What do you do to intruders?"
What do you do to intruders?
What do you do to intruders?
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]Why... I do exactly what you think. ♫
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]Ah, you forfeit your last question, then?

\!
Then allow me to demonstrate the answer regardless...

\!
All these decades spent reshaping and perfecting my body... Perfecting my skills... \|HOW?!
How about we undo all those years of work? (\C[10]Punishment\C[0])
How about we undo all those years of work? (\C[10]Punishment\C[0])
\lsn<Key>\lspi[50]\C[20]No... No no no no NO, you wouldn't DARE!!
I... I can feel my humanity returning...

\!
Soft and weak... not a joint to be seen...!!!
I... I will NEVER forgive you for this!!

\!
You have STOLEN my purpose!! My reason for being!!
...\|What did you just say to me...?
Hunting down the legendary Orbs... \|with YOU?!

\!
Have you forgotten who you're speaking to?!
I shall accompany you on your journey...

\lsoff\!
(...And once the Orbs are within my grasp...)
Well... I must change clothes, but...
\lsoffBad End "Puppetmaster" was added to the Journal!
Though my body has been... ruined, my workbench still holds everything I need to ply my trade, as it were.
Simply check my book on the table there and I can get started right away, provided we have the gold for materials.
